food.name: Greek Salad
directions: Chop cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion into bite-sized pieces.
Combine them in a salad bowl with Kalamata olives and crumbled feta cheese.
In a separate bowl, whisk together extra-virgin olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad, toss, and serve your refreshing Greek salad.

food.name: Veggie Stir-Fry
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
directions: Prepare your choice of protein (tofu or chicken) and set aside.
In a wok or large skillet, heat sesame oil and saut√© ginger and garlic.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Add the cooked protein and a splash of soy sauce. Stir-fry for another couple of minutes.
Serve over rice or noodles and enjoy your delicious veggie stir-fry.

food.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
directions: Season chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken until cooked through.
Slice chicken into strips.
Prepare salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Make a dressing with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Toss salad with dressing.
Top salad with grilled chicken strips.

food.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a pan and add garlic and ginger.
Stir-fry vegetables until tender.
Add soy sauce.
Serve over cooked rice.

food.name: Greek Salad
directions: Chop cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion.
Combine with olives and feta.
In a separate bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Toss the salad with the dressing.

food.name: Oatmeal with Berries
directions: Cook rolled oats with milk.
Top with honey, blueberries, and strawberries.
Enjoy a healthy breakfast.

food.name: Salmon with Asparagus
directions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Roast salmon and asparagus with garlic and olive oil.
Serve hot.
